snippet: State regulators are joining with Duke Energy in appealing a judge’s ruling on cleaning up groundwater pollution from the company’s coal ash dumps.
lead_paragraph: State regulators are joining with Duke Energy in appealing a judge’s ruling on cleaning up groundwater pollution from the company’s coal ash dumps.

headline.main: North Carolina: State Joins Utility in Appealing Ruling on Cleanup
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: State Joins Utility In Appealing Ruling On Cleanup
